name: Tempo-Surges #6
description:
Today's workout consists of a long tempo effort with 15-second surges along the way. Picture yourself on a long climb. Sitting on the back of the saddle, holding a steady tempo before standing on the pedals to surge for 15 seconds. To replicate the demands of a long climb, the target cadence during the Tempo portion is 75rpm.
